document.full_text: dr. french helped found an organization of doctors that provided medical care to marchers during the civil rights era and who later organized health care programs in 20 african nations.
document.title: dr. d.m. french dies at 86; treated '60s marchers
lines_and_colors: dr. french helped found an organization of doctors that provided medical care to marchers during the civil rights era and who later organized health care programs in 20 african nations.
